name: Mage Blasters
description:
Little prototype for a school project. It's a multiplayer game in which sorcerers try to kill each other with bombs. I might be bored in the future and add new features :)

Credits  Art

Characters (Sorcerers) and Items - 8-Bit Top-Down by Canarigames 
Bomb and Bomb VFX - Super Bomberman 4
Environment - Top-Down Dungeon Tileset by Enjl 
Keyboard Sprites - Pixel Keyboard Layout by Xphere 
User Interface - 1-Bit Game UI by Andelrodis

Sound

SFX - Chiptone by Sfb Games
Music - 8-Bit Top-Down by Canarigames
